title: McCarthy Announces Speaker Bid, as Republicans Grasp for House Majority
description: With many races unresolved, the top House Republican rushed to declare victory and alert his colleagues that he still meant to seek the top post, even as he toiled to shore up his right flank.
dc:creator: Annie Karni

media:content.media:description: Representative Kevin McCarthy spent much of Wednesday shoring up his position among grouchy Republicans after a close election night.
